mapper.select: SELECT t1.pro_name, t1.pro_category, t3.mem_name FROM project as t1, (select * from myorder) as t2, member as t3 WHERE t1.pro_id = t2.pro_id AND t2.mem_idx = t3.mem_idx AND t2.pro_id = 2 AND t2.mem_idx = 2;

SELECT t1.pro_name, t1.pro_category, t3.mem_name, t2.order_id FROM project as t1, (select * from myorder group by order_id) as t2, member as t3 WHERE t1.pro_id = t2.pro_id AND t1.mem_idx = t3.mem_idx AND t2.mem_idx = #{mem_idx}

select mo.idx, mo.pro_id, mo.order_count, mo.order_id, from myorder AS mo, reward_item AS ri, reward_order AS ro, project AS pro where mo.reward_id = ri.reward_id AND mo.order_id = ro.order_id AND mo.pro_id = pro.pro_id AND mo.order_id = #{order_id} AND mo.mem_idx = #{mem_idx} AND mo.pro_id = #{pro_id}
